html.div:
All of User Activities in Chronological Order
The Dashboard provides list and details of the activities performed by a User in a chronological order. i.e. PCs where he has logged in, emails sent, Removable Drives connected, Sites accessed and Files accessed.
Select the Asset and Time Period for which the activities needs to be monitored.
